name: Space Station Liberation
description:
Back Story:

Ryker the Astronaut is on a mission to Cygnus galaxy where he is ordered by the Human Space Association to gather as much Azure fragments and return them to earth, on day 431 of his mission Ryker leaves his station and travels to the planet Tadmur that has tons of azure only to return and find out that Maidu Aliens have conquered the station. Ryker's goal is to liberate the station from the aliens and return to earth.

Modified Features:

Added Shooting Functionality, Ammo Packs and Ammo Counter.

Added new Menu Music and In-Game Music.

Enhanced UI according to Story.

Hope You Enjoy!
